Don't know if this thread is just for baseball cards, but it is a "T" card.  $300 shipped

[url=https://flic.kr/p/Wxht2k][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4235/35797289545_4a6f751f5e_z.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/Wxht2k]T79[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/156429676@N05/]Tony Biviano[/url], on Flickr

[url=https://flic.kr/p/WhiNFW][img]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4281/35627803372_094e3e6998_z.jpg[/img][/url][url=https://flic.kr/p/WhiNFW]T792[/url] by [url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/156429676@N05/]Tony Biviano[/url], on Flickr

Hey Tony!

cool card!  I found one as well, FWIW SGC has the variation designation when I sent it in for grading!

TTYL!

Cliff
